conflicts.name: Daffanaufal
conflicts.details: I ordered a new laptop from your website and when it arrived, it was damaged. The screen was cracked and the keyboard was broken. I would like a refund or a replacement laptop.

conflicts.name: Vin Diesel
conflicts.details: I ordered a new TV from your website and it was supposed to be delivered on January 1st. However, it didn't arrive until January 3rd. I would like a refund for the shipping costs.

conflicts.name: Michael Lin
conflicts.details: I ordered a new phone case from your website and when it arrived, it was damaged. The corner was chipped and the case was scratched. I would like a replacement phone case.

conflicts.name: Jack Miller
conflicts.details: I ordered 10 widgets from your website, but I only received 5. I would like the missing widgets or a refund.

conflicts.name: Kim Lawn
conflicts.details: I noticed that a fraudulent charge was made on my credit card. The charge was for $100 from your website. I would like the charge reversed.

conflicts.name: John Doe
conflicts.details: I ordered a new smartphone from your website and when it arrived, it was not as described. The screen was smaller than I expected and the battery life was not as good as I was told. I would like a refund or a replacement smartphone.

conflicts.name: Jane Doe
conflicts.details: I ordered a new pair of shoes from your website and they were supposed to be delivered on January 2nd. However, they didn't arrive until January 4th. I would like a refund for the shipping costs.

conflicts.name: Bob Smith
conflicts.details: I ordered a new coffee maker from your website and when it arrived, it was damaged. The glass carafe was shattered and the machine was dented. I would like a replacement coffee maker.

conflicts.name: Lisa Wang
conflicts.details: I ordered 20 candles from your website, but I only received 15. I would like the missing candles or a refund.

conflicts.name: Tom Jones
conflicts.details: I noticed that a fraudulent charge was made on my debit card. The charge was for $50 from your website. I would like the charge reversed.

conflicts.name: Mary Lee
conflicts.details: I ordered a new dress from your website and when it arrived, it was not as described. The color was different from the picture and the size was too small. I would like a refund or a replacement dress.

conflicts.name: Peter Brown
conflicts.details: I ordered a new watch from your website and it was supposed to be delivered on January 4th. However, it didn't arrive until January 6th. I would like a refund for the shipping costs.

conflicts.name: Mary Smith
conflicts.details: I ordered a new dress from your website and when it arrived, it was damaged. The hem was torn and the fabric was stained. I would like a replacement dress.
